a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZDT02 (IMMZ.DT.02.HepatitisB) * Rule: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Hepatitis B vaccine as soon as possible after birth * Trigger: Patient has never had Hepatitis B vaccination, or missing doses in the vaccination schedule */library IMMZDT02
